luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b1.dialogo: §6§l§o<Glaivorus>§e I picture them begging for mercy among their mournful cries...
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c I quite like your idea, Glaivorus.
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c And you? What do you think?
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c Come close, then... If you dare.
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c These brave warriors want to kill me and take my treasure!
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c They're going to face the emperor! Their... emperor.
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c What shall we do? I'm deeply afraid...
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c Do we beg for mercy? Beg for our lives?
§4§l§o<Apiglo>§c What do you think, my loyal blade?
§6§l§o<Glaivorus>§e I think we can split them in half!
§6§l§o<Glaivorus>§e Paint the walls with their blood!
§6§l§o<Glaivorus>§e Gut them! Pierce them! Slay them!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b2.dialogo: §4§l§o<Thar Kroo> TODO
§cEnough!
§cYou beat every challenge I presented to you.
§cOnce you cross the portal, you shan't take another step without my past self noticing your pressence... And mine.
§cHe will take your minds, and it shall be the end.
§l§o<Koros>
Then... How do you pretend that we storm §dParadox Citadel§f without meeting certain death?
§cThere is only one way.
§cThis construct keeps my mind together. If I destroy it, the essence of my mind will flow towards your bodies.
§cThis will grant you immunity to his power, at least for a while... Before I extinguish forever.
It's crazy! You'll never exist again!
§cKoros, there is only one way to win, and I'm willing to take the sacrifice if necessary.
I understand... Maker.
§cKoros, I'm proud of you. It is time to finish what we started.
§cThere are no doubts, you are strong enough as to face him...
Of course.
§cAnd now, brave warriors... Be prepared! It is time to part.
§cI trust in you. Make the universe free, and make me free from my own past.
§cFrom my past self.
And where must we go now?
§cIn the present, §dParadox Citadel§c is nothing but ashes. A failed attempt of unifying everyone.
§cBut millenia ago, §dParadox Citatel§c was the main base of my empire. From there, I organized by bloody, evil crusade.
§cI shall open a portal in time and you will storm §dParadox Citadel§c, so that my crusade may never happen.
¿Y por qué no vienes con nosotros
Why don't you come with us?
§cI'm not strong enough to face my past self. And there is another inconvenience.
§4§l§o<The Traveler>
§cFinally...
§cI've been waiting this moment for millenia.
§cIt took me millenia to notice the path of extinction, death and terror I had left behind.
§cAnd for more millenia, anchored to this immortal body, I lived tormented and refretful for the atrocities I partook in.
§cI chose the wrong path, to use my immense power without worry to end everything and start anew.
§cNo one was ever able to beat me. No one was ever able to make me see my mistake. Only time could.
§cBut now, you can change everything.
§cTravel in time, and end §dmy past self§c is the only way to start anew.
§cHowever, first I need to ensure you're both strong and astute enough as to manage to achieve such a goal.
§cFace me, and prove to me that Koros is not wrong.
§cThis is your final test before the final duel.
§cI will not hold back. Be prepared.
§cKoros, much like I ordered, you managed to guide the best champions that this era has known... To me.
Champions, talk to me before the encounter. Thar Kroo is really powerful.
Yes, maker.
No doubt they are.
§cYou have witnessed with your own eyes. Entropy, chaos, ruin... Created by Thar Kroo's conquest...
§cToday shall be the day we forge a new future for this universe.
§cBut first, you must know something... §dI am Thar Kroo§c.
§cEons ago I conquered each and all stars in the cosmos, with the objective of bringing peace and unity onto the galaxy.
§cAnd I achieved it... I became immortal and I abandoned my material self to transcend into eternity.
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b3.dialogo: §eYou enter my lab! You break everything! You kill my workers!
§eDo you have the faintest idea how expensive everything you destroyed was?!
§eYou are idiots incapable of appreciating my work!
§eYou're nothing but rats in my laboratory.
§eYou shall test in your own flesh the power of the weapons I developed!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b5.dialogo: The bounty of this room is ours!
§rWe need the Core to stop the Conqueror!
§cVery cute... but rules are rules. Finders keepers!
§rYou don't understand what's at stake. Hand the Core to us!
What you don't understand is that there's a code of honor to respect among bountyhunters.
If you really want this treasure, we'll settle it with a fight.
§cAnd it won't be easy this time!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b8.dialogo: §eDetected enemies of the Makers in range!
§eIntruders shall be eradicated! The workshop, protected!
luisb1202.functions.carga_lanas.16_negra: §cVery well! It would appear my future self sent new buffoons for me to play!
§cI'll await inside my citadel or a final audience. Feel lucky...
§cIf you manage to get there alive!
§cIt's admirable that you've managed to get this far.
§cBut those who fight against peace like you have no place in this universe!
§cFeel the grip of my power and kneel before me!
luisb1202.functions.forja.atacrom.dialog: Truth be told, you don't look good.
I don't know what Koros saw in you, but I have no choice but to help, so.
My name is Atacrom, and I'm the Stygian Forger.
And this is my forge... My home.
Where you are welcome, as long as you don't annoy me too much...
In this anvil I can use the power of §eStygian Remnants§f to combine a pair of §eforge materials§f.
Thus forging powerful weapons and armor with my hammer!
However, they can't just be combined in any way.
Talk to me by pressing §eright click§f to find out more about how the forge works.
luisb1202.functions.talentos.altar.dialo: Finally, the new chosen ones have found §dthe Sanctuary§f.
I'll introduce myself. My name is §dKoros§r.
Since my maker left this place, I'm the entity that watches over, maintains records and remembers everything that takes place here.
And much like my maker ordered me, it is also my duty to guide and assist the chosen ones in their quest to end the §cConqueror§r.
I see you bring with you a §eCosmic Core§r. §7(White wool)
Those §ecores§r are the key to reach the §cConqueror§r.
From them, I also can extract power to grant you new §dperks§r.
However, much like with time, there are several paths, and you may only choose one out of three.
You chose your fate and left behind two other paths.
Though you can always §echange it§r if you regret it talking to me later.
Every §eCosmic Core§r you bring will unlock a new row in your §ePerk Tree§r.
So remember to visit me often!
You can check information about §eenemy modifiers§r bosses and recover §elost tomes§r.
By the way, while you're in the Sanctuary, you will receive in your inventory §ewings§r and §erockets§r to make moving around easier.
I'll always be here if you need my help.
Just press §eright click§r on me to talk to me!
